name: Rishabh Software
tag_list: offshore-software-development, web-application, custom-software-development, -net, java, open-source, offshore-application-development, mobile-app-development, iphone-app-development, ipad-app-development, andriod-app-development
overview:
Offshore Software Development

Rishabh Software is a CMMi Level 3 company that focuses on cost-effective, qualitative and timely delivered offshore software development services, business process outsourcing services and knowledge process outsourcing services.

Our services include custom software development, mobile app development, building Cloud Apps, implementation of information systems, enterprise application integratio, legacy systems support and consulting. We focus on technologies such as .NET, Java, PHP, iOS, Android as well as cloud platforms like Salesforce and Google.

Our Business Process Outsourcing (BPO) services include Recruitment Process Outsourcing (RPO), Payroll Processing and Forms Management. We assist our clients by managing their business processes, while saving 35% to 50% annually and allowing them to focus on much more important activities.

We also provide outsourcing of higher value-added professional services i.e. Knowledge Process Outsourcing (KPO) by providing services in Engineering Services Outsourcing (ESO), Accounting & Book-Keeping and developer staffing services.
